page.title: 10ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
Thanks are expressed to the following for their help in allowing access to their land and/or helping with local knowledge of the area :-
Col. & Mrs. M.L. Heathcote (Forcett) Mrs. J. Dunne (Carlton) Mr & Mrs. J. Hall (Park House) Mr. J. Holywell (Aldbrough St. John) Mr. Hilyard Johnson (Forcett)
and to the following members of {Melsonby Women's Institute :-
Mrs. Margaret West (Secretary) Miss Gwen Martin Mrs. Brenda Howe Mrs. Joyce Johnson Mrs. Margaret Hall (President)
plus Mr. John West (Editor & Computer Operator).
